bibdata.title: Standard for Overhead Type Distribution Transformers, 500 kVA and Smaller: High Voltage, 34500 Volts and Below; Low Voltage, 7970/13800Y Volts and Below
Standard for Overhead Type Distribution Transformers, 500 kVA and Smaller: High Voltage, 34500 Volts and Below; Low Voltage, 7970/13800Y Volts and Below
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.12.20-2005 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.20-1997)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard covers certain electrical, dimensional, and mechanical characteristics and safety features of single- and three-phase, 60 Hz, mineral-oil-immersed, self-cooled, overhead-type distribution transformers 500 kVA and smaller, high voltages 34 500 V and below and low voltages 7970/13 800Y V and below.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.12.20-2011 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.20-2005)

bibdata.keyword: high voltages 34 500 V and low voltages 7970/13 800Y V and below
